summary: Syntax File for the Python Template Language
name: ptl.vim
description:
Syntax File for the Python Template Language:

http://www.mems-exchange.org/software/quixote/doc/PTL.html

A language used by the Web application framework, Quixote (http://www.mems-exchange.org/software/quixote/), which is mostly Python with embedded HTML.

Uses python.vim and html.vim.
install_details: Copy the file to your ~/.vim/syntax directory as usual.
